name: WhoseTurn
0:
”Alexa, open whose turn.”
”Whose turn is it to shovel?”
”Whose turn is it to eat a bagel?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: whose turn
des: Ask Alexa whose turn it is to shovel, do laundry, wash the dishes, eat a bagel, watch tv, get a massage or let the boys out. She will choose between R, Ju and Big Daddy. You can simple say "Whose turn is it" or ask Whose turn is it to do something from the list above. She will have a sassy response!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
